title.narrative: CP & GBV VIOLATIONS ARE MITIGATED

description.narrative: Child Protection & GBV violations are mitigated and addressed., which contributes to Child Protection And Emergencies, Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Data And Child Protection, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Vulnerable Children and women (Syrian refugees & Lebanese) are protected from violence, exploitation, abuse and neglect with strengthened child protection services, systems and policies.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Child Protection & GBV violations are mitigated and addressed.

description.narrative: UNICEF Lebanon&39;s technical support for the implementation of the MoSA NP strengthened the coordination and delivery of child protection and GBV services, ensuring greater coverage and effectiveness in the response. As a result, the number of children provided with case management and children assisted by specialised services exceeded its target. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:12/01/2017
